ModMetaData.name: LMC016.探照灯
ModMetaData.author: Rikiki
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html This mod adds the MiningCo. projector, projector tower and projector turret. See the forum thread for content/changelog. https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=14711.msg153946#msg153946\n\n这个MOD添加了采矿集团科技配套的固定式探照灯，探照灯高塔和探照灯炮塔。\n\n汉化：jxb12306
